metadata.title: CVE-2019-20352 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.15rc0, a heap-based buffer over-read occurs(via a crafted .asm file) in set_text_free when called fromexpand_one_smacro in asm/preproc.c.

criterions.comment: nasm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
